code:
export const BASE_URL='https://api.bazhanov.rinat.diplom.nomoredomainsrocks.ru';// export const BASE_URL = 'http://localhost:3001/';
export const register=(email,password,name)=>{return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signup"),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({email:email,password:password,name:name})}).then(res=>{if(res.ok){return res.json();}return Promise.reject("\u041E\u0448\u0438\u0431\u043A\u0430: ".concat(res.status));});};export const authorize=(email,password)=>{return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/signin"),{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({email:email,password:password})}).then(res=>{if(res.ok){return res.json();}return Promise.reject("\u041E\u0448\u0438\u0431\u043A\u0430: ".concat(res.status));}).then(res=>{if(res.token){localStorage.setItem('token',res.token);return res;}});};export const getContent=token=>{return fetch("".concat(BASE_URL,"/users/me"),{method:'GET',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}}).then(res=>{if(res.ok){return res.json();}return Promise.reject("\u041E\u0448\u0438\u0431\u043A\u0430: ".concat(res.status));});};
